de.eckhartarnold.client

Class GWTPhotoAlbum

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.eckhartarnold.client.GWTPhotoAlbum

  • public class GWTPhotoAlbum
extends java.lang.Object
    Main class of GWTPhotoAlbum and entry point for the online photo album.

    GWTPhotoAlbum instantiates an ImageCollectionReader that reads the .json files which describe the photo album from the sub directory IMAGE_COLLECTION_DIR (usually named "slides") and then builds up the widgets according to the description in the JSON files.

    See Also:
    ImageCollectionReader

      name of the key in the info dictionary that indicates whether an optimized layout for small screen or window sizes (like on mobile devices) shall be added.

      name of the key in the info dictionary for the layout data
